title: Latest Update on League of Legends, can't update for some reason.
body: Riot please help. I tried updating the latest update 7/30/2016, but It keeps saying, "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." I already tried reinstalling but it didn't work. I don't know what's going on anymore...

replies.body: I'd like to help you out with this, but need some more information.  This error can occur for different reasons depending on how far you've come along in the patcher.  Can you provide a screen of the error, or let me know at what % this error is happening?  Looking forward to helping!
